name: Cremis

aura.name: fluffy_wool
aura.description: While in team, increases attack power of Neutral Pals. Sometimes drops Wool when assigned to Ranch.

description: Compared to Lamball, it has finer wool and a temperament more suited for domestication. However, it has historically been kept as a pet. Cuteness is considered a virtue.

skills.name: air_cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: spark_blast
skills.description: The user releases a lightning ball that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: shockwave
skills.description: Quickly discharges electricity, shocking those around it.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: lightning_bolt
skills.description: Charges electric energy before blasting enemies with a powerful shock.
